info.description:
Hello,


this is your Story. You are a young, skinny, gay guy. Normally your size is 1,73 m (5"8) but something has shrinked you to 5 cm high (about 2 inches). You always dreamed of a situation like this, but you are not sure, if it will be like you imagined it before.

You are at a friends home. The name of your friend is Max. Max is 1,84 m (6"0) tall and 18 years old. He has blond, short medium long hair and looks a bit like a skater. He always wears jogging pants and hoodies and his smelly nike sneakers, which he has since 2 years and are his only pair of shoes. He is skinny and not to hairy.

Max is straight and knows that you have a crush on him. But he is fine with it at all.


A Few Things To Keep in Mind:

-You are pliable and cannot be killed by being stepped on but you can feel a reduced amount of pain

-There will be two main story outlines. One in which Max is unaware of your presence and one in which he found you.

-As you are gay, there is no female interaction
